name: point-system-monorepo
description: Point System Monorepo with NestJS backend and Next.js frontends

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:user"
scripts.build:admin: npm run build:ui && npm run build:shared && npm run build --workspace=@point-system/admin
scripts.build:user: npm run build:ui && npm run build:shared && npm run build --workspace=@point-system/user
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --workspace=point-system-backend" "npm run start --workspace=@point-system/admin" "npm run start --workspace=@point-system/user"
scripts.start:admin: npm run start:ui && npm run start:shared && npm run start --workspace=@point-system/admin
scripts.start:user: npm run start:ui && npm run start:shared && npm run start --workspace=@point-system/user
